SUMMARY.SUMMARIZE: You can call me Matthew, it's basically the same writing and the pronunciation will be easier for english speakers;I'm a full-stack developer from Brazil with 5 years of experience using multiple techinologic stacks; I'm getting some international experiences to continue my growing process in this area;
SUMMARY.TITLE: _summary

ABOUT-ME.TITLE: _about-me
ABOUT-ME.TEXT: Hey, let me introduce myself again. My name is Mattheus, I'm from Brazil, Rio de Janeiro - RJ. I'm 23 yrs old. Nowadays I'm graduting in Psychology, and you're thinking right now 'what the hell?', don't be afraid, everybody asks me why. I'm dreaming about the day, of course in the future, that I'll be responsible for managing others developers and tech people, and the psychology will help me to do this;I'm a simple guy that likes to play music, read something - actually I'm trying to write as well, play video-games online with friends, walk in afternoon and ride my motorcycle. I like the simple things;I have achieved my dream of going to work abroad with Portugal been the first country to open up the doors for me;;

EXPERIENCES.Title: Invillia
EXPERIENCES.Text: Frontend development with Razor MVC & C# & .Net Framework; Agile method with Scrum & Kanban;

EXPERIENCES.Title: Itaú-Unibanco
EXPERIENCES.Text: BFF development with JAVA & Spring Boot applying Clean Code principles;Frontend development with Angular 9+;Log collection and dashboard creation using SPLUNK;Agile methods using Scrum & Kanban;

EXPERIENCES.Title: Rabbot
EXPERIENCES.Text: API development using C# & .NET Core, SQL Server, applying S.O.L.I.D and Clean Code principles; Frontend with Angular 9+ & SCSS; Architecture focusing in Events;

EXPERIENCES.Title: Fëng Brasil
EXPERIENCES.Text: Frontend development with Angular 7 and migration to Angular 11+; API development using NodeJS & AdonisJS, migration from PHP to NodeJS applying S.O.L.I.D and EsLint; Database with SQL Server; Caching with Redis; White-label creation focusing in start new project faster using Angular ClI + NodeJS & AdonisJS CLI [Written own CLI]; Agile methods using Scrum & Kanban;

EXPERIENCES.Title: CR2 Sistemas
EXPERIENCES.Text: Frontend development with AngularJS & CSS, Angular 2+ & SCSS; Backend development with C# [Entityframework, JWT, Swagger, OAuth], PHP [Laravel] and Python [SMS queue server]; Deploying API with Azure;

EXPERIENCES.Title: A2B Group
EXPERIENCES.Text: Frontend development with AngularJS and VueJS; Backend development with C# [Entityframework, JWT, Swagger, OAuth, Roles] applying S.O.L.I.D principles; Deploying with AWS;
